department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch: 建立遙測各領域基本原理之基礎及跨領域整合應用之概念
goal.en: To establish the fundamental concept of remote sensing principle and the integration of interdisciplinary application.

outline.ch: 遙測基本概念，遙測資料，遙測衛星系統，遙測數據影像處理，遙測影像圖形識別概念，變遷分析，地理資訊系統簡介，遙測資料幾何處理，三維資訊萃取，大氣輻射概念，大氣遙測，微波遙測，合成孔徑，雷達簡介及其應用，衛星量測及導航，全球定位系統簡介，遙測綜合定位，衛星氣象。
outline.en: “Fundamentals of Remote Sensing, Digital Image Processing for Remote Sensing, Fundamentals of Atmospheric Radiation, Geometric Data Processing for Remotely Sensed Data, 3-D Information Extraction, Satellite Surveying and Navigation, Introduction to Global Positioning System(GPS), Remote Sensing of Aerosol, Introduction to Geographic Information Systems(GIS), Remote Sensing of Atmosphere, Atmospheric Microwave Remote Sensing, Hyperspectral Image Processing and Applications, Fundamental of Geological Remote Sensing, SAR Applications in Geology“

textbook.ch: 1. T.Lilles and R.Kiefer, Remote Sensing and Image Interpretation2. S.Murai(ed.), Remote Sensing Note3. F. Sabins, Remote Sensing-Principles ＆ Interpretation
textbook.en: 1. T.Lilles and R.Kiefer, Remote Sensing and Image Interpretation2. S.Murai(ed.), Remote Sensing Note3. F. Sabins, Remote Sensing-Principles ＆ Interpretation
